Literature.Title: Purification and synergistic antibacterial activity of arginine derived cyclic dipeptides, from Achromobacter sp. associated with a rhabditid entomopathogenic nematode against major clinically relevant biofilm forming wound bacteria.
Literature.Author: Deepa I, Kumar SN, Sreerag RS, Nath VS, Mohandas C

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Bacillus subtilis MTCC 2756(MIC=8µg/ml),Bacillus subtilis MTCC 2756(MBC=16µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus MTCC 902(MIC=16µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus MTCC 902(MBC=32µg/ml),Staphylococcus epidermidis MTCC 435(MIC=16µg/ml),Staphylococcus epidermidis MTCC 435(MBC=16µg/ml),Enterococcus faecalis MTCC 5383(MIC=32µg/ml),Enterococcus faecalis MTCC 5383(MBC=64µg/ml),Enterococcus faecium MTCC 439(MIC=16µg/ml),Enterococcus faecium MTCC 439(MBC=32µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa MTCC 2642(MIC=125µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa MTCC 2642(MBC=250µg/ml),Proteus vulgaris MTCC 742(MIC=500µg/ml),Proteus vulgaris MTCC 742(MBC=500µg/ml),Proteus mirabilis MTCC 425(MIC=125µg/ml),Proteus mirabilis MTCC 425(MBC=125µg/ml),Klebsiella pneumoniae MTCC 109(MIC=250µg/ml),Klebsiella pneumoniae MTCC 109(MBC=500µg/ml),Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Typhi MTCC 3216(MIC=64µg/ml),Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Typhi MTCC 3216(MBC=125µg/ml)
